local_intent: Approach and align to the grape with precise tolerance, retrying once via a brief upward re-approach, then stabilize and verify pose at target.
assumptions: Positive z is upward for MoveDelta
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global plan with 0.005 alignment tolerance and short timeouts, adding a retry that re-approaches from above as per recovery strategy, then verifies pose before grasp.
